overview:
I am driven by a passion for creating things that people not only love to use, but that make a real difference in their lives.

I am a Co Founder in Yoink, and joined our partner company Bonobo after winning the 2011 Singapore Startup weekend, having the good fortune to work with Mike on our 48-hour project & really enjoying working together. Bonobo applications have been featured in the New York Times and CNN as well as topping the App Store charts in several countries, both paid and free. Bonobo is a self funded company and was nominated for a 2010 Webby Award.

In my previous role as Director of Sales for The Foundry, I relocated from our London office to Los Angeles to set up and run the American sales & support office for this rapidly growing visual effects software company. I generated Â£4m in sales for clients including Sony, Dreamworks SKG & Industrial Light & Magic (Lucasfilm). I have a track record in beating performance targets, and contributed to the company growing 300% during this period.
